name: Army as one
description:
a rather short game I made for MashUpGameJam2020.

You play as the royal block. Connect with other blocks and make use of their abilities to navigate through the levels.

actionkeymoveA,Djumpspacebarconnect/disconnect blockleft mouse buttonfireFrestart levelRback to level selectEscapebrowsing levelsA,Dstart selected levelEnter
